Ingredients.5: 3 sprigs fresh rosemary, or more to taste

Ingredients.6: 3 sprigs fresh thyme, or more to taste

Ingredients.10: 1 (16 pound) whole turkey, neck and giblets removed

Directions.1: Bring 2 quarts water to a boil in a large pot; stir kosher salt and white sugar into the water to dissolve completely. Remove from heat and let cool somewhat before transferring to a large food-safe container large enough to hold the brine and turkey, but small enough to fit in your refrigerator. Pour 2 gallons cold water into the container; add rosemary sprigs, thyme sprigs, garlic, Allspice, and black pepper.

Directions.2: Gently submerge turkey into the brine; refrigerate for 12 to 36 hours.

Directions.3: Remove turkey from the brine and rinse both inside and outside thoroughly. Discard brine.
